AbstractValidationMessage - org.seasar.golf.validation.message の クラス
An abstract class that minimizes the effort required to implement the ValidationMessage interface.
AbstractValidationMessage(String, Severity) - クラス org.seasar.golf.validation.message.AbstractValidationMessage のコンストラクタ
Constructs an AbstractValidationMessage for the given text and Severity.
AbstractValidationMessage(String, Severity, Object) - クラス org.seasar.golf.validation.message.AbstractValidationMessage のコンストラクタ
Constructs an AbstractValidationMessage for the given text, Severity, and association key.
